attributes.action: Cut income tax to 0% for people earning £12000 per annum or less
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is unjust that the poorest in the country have to struggle to live, when the country is so prosperous. In the SE of England (and London in particular) it is difficult to live, eat and clothe oneself for less than 1000 UK Pounds per month. If you really want to alleviate poverty in Britain, do this.
